item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Downtown at the Taft

Formerly Hot Tomatoes, the new management is pleased to welcome the NHC for our first happy hour and has offered us the following specials:

House Wine - $4.00
House Beer - $5.00
Sangria - $5.00

Free appetizer buffet

Contact info: Suzanne 203-499-9607

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Downtown at the Taft
